name: Cave
description: A natural cave provides shelter and potential access to underground resources, but the darkness and confined space can hide dangerous creatures. The stable temperature makes it ideal for storage, while the complex passages can lead to treasure or death.
atmosphere: Dark, mysterious world beneath surface. Cool, still air carries earth, stone, and hidden secrets scent. Absolute darkness creates mystery and potential danger. Confined space can hide dangerous creatures or valuable treasures. Stable temperature creates permanence and shelter sense. Complex passages create natural maze.
